content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to browse the website for the Brno Reservoir trail, but encountered an error. Then, I used the command "google" to search for route planning options. The command returned several links to websites such as outdooractive.com, alltrails.com, and komoot.com, as well as TripAdvisor and Brno Expat Centre.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "question": "What is the best route to take on the Brno Reservoir trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a description of a hiking route around the Brno Reservoir in the Czech Republic. The route is 22.7 km long and takes approximately 6.5 hours to complete. It includes several bus stops towards the end, making it easy to shorten the route if desired. The trail includes a mix of asphalt, dirt road, forested/wild trail, path, and road. The best time of year to hike the trail is not specified. The starting point is the Přístaviště tram stop and the destination is the Rakovecká tram stop. Public transportation is available via frequent trams (1, 3, and 11) and night buses 92 and 98. The text does not provide information on the best route to take on the Brno Reservoir trail.\n\nLinks: ['Skip to content (https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/#mainContent)', 'Map (https://www.outdooractive.com/en/map/)', 'Route Finder (https://www.outdooractive.com/en/routes/)', 'Route Planner (https://www.outdooractive.com/en/routeplanner/)', 'Travel Guide (https://www.outdooractive.com/en/travel-guide/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
